definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: After drinking some wine, I feel warm all over.
Made of carbon fiber (developed in partnership with Callaway Golf), it's both light and more lithe.
sentences.chinese: 由於周身由碳纖維製成，它不光輕盈而且柔軟。

sentences.english: When fear creeps into your head, name it for what it is, and let it pass by.
sentences.chinese: 當恐懼在你的周身蔓延，講出來，然後讓恐懼感過去。

sentences.english: I felt a chill creep over me.
By controlling the force which governs the prana, he can surround himself with a blaze of light.
sentences.chinese: 通過控制支配菩拉那的力量，瑜伽師周身可放出光芒。

sentences.english: In the body, there are distributed numerous small Collaterals known as floating Collaterals or minute Collaterals.
sentences.chinese: 周身所布無數細小絡脈，稱浮絡和孫絡。

sentences.english: The body of a dragon made of black gold and encrusted with diamonds.
sentences.chinese: 惡龍的周身是用黑金打製，鑲鑽。

sentences.english: The fish doesn't even KNOW it's wet in the first place.
sentences.chinese: 但魚根本就不知道它們一開始就是周身潮溼的呀。

definition: surface of the body/periphery of the body/body thermometer/(literary) a person's appearance
pubic region/point two inches below the navel where one's qi resides
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
